long_description: The Patagonia Black Hole messenger bag is a highly water-resistant, super-durable bag designed to carry your laptop and other gear on daily commutes and longer trips. Main compartment contains 2 mesh pockets, key keeper and organizer panel; interior padded sleeve protects most 17 in. laptops. Main flap has daisy chain, LED attachment loop and external pocket with water-shedding, reverse-coil zipper; second zippered pocket and additional daisy chain under the flap. Fully adjustable seatbelt-webbing shoulder strap with floating pad, reflective material and webbing attachment points. 3-point adjustable stability strap and padded carrying handle ensure a comfortable and secure carry. Patagonia Black Hole messenger bag's shoulder strap can be set up for right or left usage; single-handed, quick shoulder strap adjustment.
short_description: The Patagonia Black Hole messenger bag is a highly water-resistant, super-durable bag designed to carry your laptop and other gear on daily commutes and longer trips.
